vulnerabilities: Download of Code Without Integrity Check
description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) as it uses user input to construct a file path without proper sanitization. It is also vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) (CWE-918) as it makes a HTTP request to a URL constructed from user input without validation. Lastly, it downloads code without an integrity check (CWE-494), which could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.
